hey guys, dunno if you allready made this work, but if you patch the game with --> http://www.vgpro.com/file/4995_install_pcm_patch_15r.exe.html

This made it work for me:

1) install the game
2) install the "demo" patch in the Crack directory
3) Reboot your computer when asked...
4) Install the 1.5R patch
5) run the game...

Worked for me somehow... 
:-)
also important not to have any Cds or DvDs in your computer...
